Row.Text: Blessings be upon you, Supreme Guardian Bronya Rand. The people of Belobog, both on the surface and underground, admire your brilliance and tenacity.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ever since the sacrifice of your predecessor, former Supreme Guardian Cocolia Rand, and the removal of the Stellaron from Jarilo-VI, the planet has slowly begun to recover thanks to your men's continued fight against the remaining Fragmentum. Now that the snow has cleared, and the almost millennia-long corrosion has started to recede, we can begin exploring the renewed ecosystem of our planet. Perhaps other parts of our civilization managed to survive the Eternal Freeze in another, distant corner of our world?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Oh, glorious Supreme Guardian, the people look for your guidance as you lead them into a new era. Will you be able to build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
Any unit you own, that visits or is created in the capital city of Belobog, gains a special promotion, granting +1 [ICON_MOVES] Moves.

The Union constructed this enormous sculpture as a monument to Plamya warding off the frigid cold and saving their people, sealing the struggle between civilization and the Eternal Freeze outside the city's mighty walls. The massive ice crystal cast between the steel gears signifies humanity's victory over the Eternal Freeze and that civilization shall never fall.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It's because of Plamya's providence that humans were able to live in the Towering Citadel of Belobog, free from fear of the ice and snow on the other side of the wall.

Replacement for the Monument building, providing better [ICON_CULTURE] cultural and [ICON_PEACE] faith output than the building it replaces. It costs no [ICON_GOLD] Gold to maintain. It may only be built by Bronya.
Replacement for the Monument building. It costs no [ICON_GOLD] Gold to maintain, provides [ICON_CULTURE] 2 culture and [ICON_PEACE] 1 faith per turn. It may only be built by Bronya.
The Silvermane Guards are the organization that maintains peace and security in the city of Belobog on Jarilo-VI. They serve the Supreme Guardian of Belobog.
Replacement for the Spearman unit, providing equal fighting strength as a Swordsman while costing no [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron to train. Gains a special "Silvermane Tenacity" promotion.
Replacement for the Spearman unit. As strong as the Swordsman, these units cost no [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron to produce and gain a special "Silvermane Tenacity" promotion.
This unit has received special training at the capital. Grants +1 [ICON_MOVES] Moves.
Silvermane Guards are a persistent bunch. You can move after attacking enemies.
